text: The 1960 South Dakota gubernatorial election was held on November 8, 1960. Incumbent Democratic Governor Ralph Herseth was defeated by Republican nominee Archie M. Gubbrud, who won 50.73% of the vote. ==Primary elections== Primary elections were held on June 7, 1960. ===Democratic primary=== ====Candidates==== *Ralph Herseth, incumbent Governor ====Results==== ===Republican primary=== ====Candidates==== *Archie M. Gubbrud, Speaker of the South Dakota House of Representatives ====Results==== ==General election== ===Candidates=== *Ralph Herseth, Democratic *Archie M. Gubbrud, Republican ===Results=== ==References== ==Bibliography== * 1960 South Dakota Gubernatorial Category:November 1960 events
title: 1960 South Dakota gubernatorial election
